name: C. RationalLee
statement:
Lee has n integers a_1, a_2,
ldots, a_n in his backpack and he has k friends. Lee would like to
distribute integers in his backpack between his friends, such that the
i-th friend will get exactly w_i integers and each integer will be
handed over to exactly one friend.Let’s define the of a friend as the
sum of the maximum and the minimum integer he’ll get.Lee would like to
make his friends as happy as possible, in other words, he’d like to
maximize the sum of friends’ happiness. Now he asks you to calculate the
maximum sum of friends’ happiness.
